title: I can't play, help.
body: I couldn't play all day long because of this and I don't know why, is obvious that if I'm connected{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body:
Most of the time when I come across this type of error it has to do with certain firewall settings. It's not uncommon for firewalls to block access to our servers, which would make more sense if this happens almost every time. 

Check out your [**firewall settings and either disable or add exceptions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq3) for League.
thanks for the help, league does not appear as an activatable application but it reset the firewall and there was no problem, this problem also had spotify{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
